data.name: Cable
data.description: A time-traveler from the future who can manipulate turn order and charge up attacks to blast his enemies.

starItems.name: Cable
starItems.description: A time-traveler from the future who can manipulate turn order and charge up attacks to blast his enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>15%</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage. If not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all secondary targets
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from all targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary and secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary and secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
> Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar of primary target by +<color=#86e619>25%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
> Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from the primary target
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from all secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target.
> Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all secondary targets
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all positive effects from the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, in addition:
> Clear all positive effects from primary target.
> Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from secondary targets.
> Attack targets <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces from primary for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
> Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
On Kill, fill Speed Bars by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
On Kill, fill Speed Bars by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>70%</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>470%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>70%</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>530%</color> Unavoidable damage. If Deadpool is an ally, gain assist from Deadpool.

On Kill, fill Cable and Deadpool's Speed Bars by <color=#86e619>70%</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for Self and all allies.
On <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn: <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to another random ally, and, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for Self and all allies.
On <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On Turn: <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to another random ally, and, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier On Turn and on <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

3.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for Self and all allies.
On <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On Turn: <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to another random ally, and, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random ally

4.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for Self and all allies.
On <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On Turn: <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to another random ally, and, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier on <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for Self and all allies.
On <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On Turn: <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> ally, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to another random ally, and, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally
